comments:
I just picked up I20060704-0800 for Linux-GTK.  I create a new launch config, deselect some test plugins from the Plug-ins tab, and validate the plugins.

That's when I get:

PW

Hi Paul,

The error comes when looking for the last instance of a '.' in the product id.  Could you let me know what product the launcher is trying to run?

This also doesn't appear to be a problem any more ... There seems to have been some interaction between that build, PDE, and my workspace that was creating the launch config with a product of "" (my log from the other bug contained):

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.runtime 2006-07-05 10:41:09.725
!MESSAGE Product  could not be found.

even though the launch config itself showed a product selected, like org.eclipse.platform.ide in the combo box on the Main tab.

This isn't a problem any more, and was probably caused by my bug 149681

PW
cool.  I think you opened a third bug on that ill-fated day too.
